worldofzuul

Class Conversation

  • java.lang.Object
    • worldofzuul.Conversation

  • public class Conversation
extends java.lang.Object
    A new object of conversation gets created everytime a player meets an NPC This handles all of the question and answers the question has To create the conversation, you need to read the equivalent JSON file The creation of a conversation is done in the method "createWholeConversation" and therefore not in the constructor

      • createWholeConversation

        public void createWholeConversation(java.util.List<java.lang.String> text)
        Creates the whole conversation based on a list of strings coming from a file This is soon to be changed, when JSON starts working
        Parameters:
        text - the list fetched from a file

      • processAnswer

        public void processAnswer(java.lang.String userAns)
        Gets the current question of the conversation to try and find an answer from the parameter
        Parameters:
        userAns - a string, which is the second word the use typed in along with the command "say"

      • getPossibleAnswers
